questions.question_text:
A certificate profile set to AUTO will expire in 2 days and no new certificates are being renewed.
Which certificate template configuration can an administrator modify to start renewing these certificates sooner?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-UEM/services/System_Settings_On_Prem/GUID-AWT-SYSTEM-EI-CAS.html?hWord=N4IghgNiBcIIIFcAuB7AtmJBLAxgAgGEBTAJ2wDNdMi8AlIgOyIHdIQBfIA
Automatic Certificate Renewal Select the Automatic Certificate Renewal checkbox to have certificates using this template automatically renewed prior to their expiration date. If Automatic Certificate Renewal is enabled, specify the Auto Renewal Period in days and make sure the assignment type is set to Auto.

comments.content: Correct the answer should be D

discussion.content: Correct, Workspace ONE UEM automatically requests JCCH to reissue the certificate in the Auto Renewal Period (days) field. This requires the certificate profile on JCCH to have the Duplicated Certificates setting enabled.
